K10D0274_H0276:93a-1: a'arya budha ma ku tam n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tram mah'a dharma ba rya yam/

K10D0274_H0276:100a-11: pa yin no // stsal to // bud med kyis

K10D0274_H0276:100a-13: pa yin no // stsal to // // bud med

K10D0274_H0276:100a-22: rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang

K10D0274_H0276:100b-9: 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni bsod nams chen
K10D0274_H0276:100b-13: rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang
K10D0274_H0276:100b-14: dag par zhugs pa gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom
K10D0274_H0276:100b-15: ldan 'das rnams la ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta
K10D0274_H0276:100b-16: bu de tsam gyi gser gyi phung po 'bul zhing

K10D0274_H0276:100b-19: brgya stong du dbul ba 'bul bar byed pa bas
K10D0274_H0276:100b-20: ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yongs su bzung ba'i dge
K10D0274_H0276:100b-21: ba'i rtsa ba 'di la brgya'i char yang nye bar
K10D0274_H0276:100b-26: dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste /
K10D0274_H0276:100b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0274_H0276:100b-28: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa'i mtshan 'dzin

K10D0274_H0276:100b-31: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K10D0274_H0276:101a-0: de dag dus dang dus min mkhyen @101a *//
K10D0274_H0276:101a-2: sems can thams cad dag la phan mdzad pa //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-3: de dag shar dang lho dang nub dang ni //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-4: byang gi phyogs rnams dag na rab bzhugs pa //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-5: skyes bu rnams kyi gtso bo de dag la //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-6: nyin par dang ni mtshan mo dag tu yang //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-7: gus dang bcas pas thal sbyar phyag byos shig /
K10D0274_H0276:101a-8: mi yi dam pa gang dag ni //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-9: bskal pa stong na 'byung ba yi //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-10: mchog tu rnyed dka' de la yang //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-11: phyag byas mngon shes ci zhig yod //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-12: sangs rgyas bkur sti byed 'dod dang //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-13: rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa nyid //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-14: des ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-15: rgyal bas bshad pa 'di mnyan bya //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-16: sangs rgyas ye shes bskyed pa la //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-17: nam yang som nyi mi za ste //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-20: gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas la //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-21: mchod pa bsam yas byed 'dod pa //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-22: de yis sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-23: gzhan dag la ni rab bstan bya //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-24: gang zhig sems can bye ba dag /
K10D0274_H0276:101a-25: srid pa spangs par dgrol 'dod pa //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-26: de yis sangs rgyas mtshan thos na //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-27: mi nyid du ni de mi skye //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-28: gang zhig zhing ni bye ba dag /
K10D0274_H0276:101a-29: rkang pa'i mthe bos bsgul 'dod pa //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-30: de yis sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-31: skye bo mang la de bstan bya //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-32: gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'di 'dzin de //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-33: rgyal ba 'dren pa mang po mchod pas na //
K10D0274_H0276:101a-34: des ni skye ba gcig gis ma yin la //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-0: bcu yis ma yin nyi @101b shus ma yin no //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-1: 'jig rten 'di ni gangg'a'i bye snyed kyi //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-2: rin chen gser gyi mdog gis bkang 'bul bas //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-3: gang zhig sangs rgyas mchog gi mtshan thos na //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-4: sbyin phung de yis brgya yi char mi phod //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-5: gang zhig sangs rgyas mtshan 'di thos nas 'dzin //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-6: de dag mir gyur mchog ni legs par rnyed //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-7: de mi'i 'jig rten dbyangs kyi yan lag ldan //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-8: rab tu 'byung ba legs rnyed zas legs spyad //
K10D0274_H0276:101b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0274_H0276:101b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0274_H0276:101b-12: gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /
K10D0274_H0276:101b-16: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis
K10D0274_H0276:101b-17: gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par
K10D0274_H0276:101b-18: bstod do // theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las /
K10D0274_H0276:101b-19: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan zhes bya ba
K10D0274_H0276:101b-20: theg pa chen po'i mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen
K10D0274_H0276:101b-21: po rdzogs so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya sidha dang /
